keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.CORE

Class Gene

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.CORE.Gene

  • public class Gene
extends java.lang.Object

    This class represents a gene (i.e. a relation for a set of attribute values). The real values are stored in normalized form, and the nominal values are stored in a list form.

    • Constructor Summary

      Parameterized constructor

      Deep-copy constructor

        Retrieves the real value of this gene

        the real value of this relation (normalized!)

      • setNominalValue

        public void setNominalValue(int index,
                            boolean activation)

        sets the activation for a nominal value, represented by its index in the nominal values list of the attribute

        Parameters:
        index - the index of the nominal value
        activation - the new activation status

      • addNominalValues

        public void addNominalValues(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> values)

        add a set of nominal values, so their status are now active

        Parameters:
        values - the arraylist with the nominal values to be added

      • removeNominalValues

        public void removeNominalValues(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> values)

        removes a set of nominal values from the active list (if active)

        Parameters:
        values - arraylist with the proper nominal values

      • getAttribute

        public Attribute getAttribute()

        Gets the attribute associated to this gene

        Returns:
        the attribute of this gene

      • mutate

        public void mutate()

        Mutates this gene. If nominal, swaps its activation status with 0.5 probability. If real valued, generates a random new value or new bounds.

      • same

        public boolean same(Gene g)

        Test if two genes are the same, comparing all their values.

        Parameters:
        g - the reference gene to be compared with
        Returns:
        True if equals in values, false otherwise

      • test

        public boolean test(double input)

        Test a value from an instance (of the data set), to see if it is covered.

        Parameters:
        input - the input value (of the same attribute as this Gene!)
        Returns:
        true if covered, false if not
